description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Grave Breaker is the first in a series of Survival Packs from Veks and Silence. Features local co-operative multi-player, fight the horde with a friend. This game features three all new graveyard themed arenas. Compete for high scores while working together to kill zombies and survive waves of undead. Random bonus modes allow you to get extra points for killing zombies under specific conditions.
